text: Kolkata district is an administrative district of West Bengal. The city of Kolkata is headquarters of the district. == Demographics == According to the 2011 census of India, Kolkata district has a population of 4,486,679.This gives it a ranking of 35th in India (out of a total of 640). The district has a population density of . ==References== Category:Districts of West Bengal
title: Kolkata district
